name: Margaret Moore
text: They're closed. There's signs up on all the windows about ordering online and not one place is available for Battle Creek location.  I'm not willing to drive to another city in order to get their pizza. Really sad that our Battle Creek location has closed down.

name: Crystal Underhile
text: Love the pumpkin pizzas!

name: Jamie B
text: Their pizza is really good and the prices are good. But, be careful if you're lactose intolerant and using the Papa Murphy's app to order. To NOT get cheese on your pizza, you first have to select cheese under the "create your own" option. â€¦More

name: Doug Fry
text: Best pizza that I've had in Battle Creek. They also offer a good gluten free crust. Very fast service.

name: Richard Buchholz
text: Excellent I think Papa Murphy thanks the best pizza plus he appreciates military and you get to make it your way

name: Jolene Watson
text: Nice an polite ðŸ˜ƒ  Clean store an there is no waiting for them to great an server you.

name: Tina Huxley
text: Great food poor customer service most of the time.

name: B Fry
text: Friendly, cheaper than delivery, and pretty easy. The staff were really friendly.  Don't want to drop $40 on pizza night? Go here.

name: Walter Wilson
text: Food here is always good and the ingredients are fresh. Staff is pretty friendly all the time. Be warned! This place is pretty busy most of the time so it's really best to order ahead.

name: Luci D.
text: Great place. The stuffed pizzas will feed a family of 6. They take EBT cards as well.

name: Kasandra Faulkner
text: It was really good, best pizza I've had in a very long time

name: Sharlie Jones
text: They get a 5* for the pizza and 0 stars for the  employees for that night. The cashier overchared us $6.00,know your math before you start working on being a cashier.  The guy that's suppose to be making pizza's,he act's like he don't know â€¦More

name: Cheri Shea
text: Good price but it was pretty greasy.

name: Sue Andrews
text: Very polite workers.  Pizza is real good

name: David Humeston
text: The employees are very helpful.  I like the fact that I can pick the pizza up and cook it at my convenience. Very inexpensive Pizza.

name: matthew green
text: Not to bad of place to get pizza from only down side is sometimes the have more orders from online so it slows down the walk in orders

name: Natasha Crow
text: One of the best pizza places in town. I buy a pizza from here once a week most of the time. Friendly staff and fresh ingredients.

name: Alex W
text: Going to the store was super easy and the pizza was great, the only problem I had was when I attempted to call in our order and the representative told me it would be 4 hours. We decided to walk in and see if they had any pre built pizzas â€¦More

name: Kristine Kelly
text: Love this place it is a friendly place to get a good pizza to make hot and fresh  from home when you are ready6

name: James Sims
text: Store is always very clean and the employees always are very kind and nice.

name: Gary Held
text: Great pizza, good value !

name: Jeffrey Broughton
text: I think the cowboy and the Chicago are the best pizzas. You call ahead they make it you pick it up you take it home and you cook it when you're hungry

name: James Moore
text: Normally I would say great place great food. But today's visit my wife moved just in time because one of the ceiling tiles fell on the cash register and where she was standing.

name: Jennifer Peck
text: Next time I want to take tbe stress out of cooking I will avoid this place. So much fun after a long day's work to have to beg a few more zucchini slices from the sullen teenage boy making my pie. Once home and 7 minutes in to the 12-18 â€¦More

name: Jonathon Shaw
text: Good pizza, get their daily text messages for some big savings.

name: Angella Cotter
text: Papa Murphy's on W. Columbia Ave has a great selection of pizza's, deserts, salads and drinks. The staff is friendly, he)pful  and fast. A lot of people also like the fact you can use your EBT card to pay for your meal.

name: Greg Ryan
text: It's a nice place to get pizza. I wish they still have one in Coldwater Michigan.

name: Erica Hill
text: Good quality food

name: nic belt
text: Love this pizza! Always switch between papas favorite and the bacon bacon bacon.

name: Rebekah Orr
text: My 1st time there! Very friendly and helpful!

name: Patrick
text: Food is great, military discounts,  great service.   Couldn't ask for anything better.

name: Scotty
text: Good Pizza...Ill be back to try other types of pizza

name: jjflash1987
text: Not fancy but ,Good pizza.  Thin crust our favorite.  The cowboy pizza and the Thai pizza are our go-to pizzas.

name: Justin G
text: Staff trys their best but a poor management brings the place and the quality of the food down

name: Jonathan Potter
text: This place is a joke. Took them 50 minutes to make one pizza. They lost two ppls call in orders who jumped the line. Then they made extra pizzas for the ppl in front of us because they were distracted talking about fidgit spinners. The guy even tried talking us out of the 2 liter because of the price. Never again

text: Good pizza every week on Friday for the kids

text: Just ordered 3 pizzas, 1 was wrong and I was not driving back there.  They said they would give me a dollar off my next order.  What a bunch of morons, not going back ever.
